meanings.definition: A practical section of a course of study
meanings.sent1: In our science class, we had weekly practicums where we conducted experiments.
meanings.sent2: The nursing students completed their practicums at the hospital to gain hands-on experience.
meanings.sent3: During the practicums, the students accidentally mixed up the chemicals, creating a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: The practicums were like puzzle pieces that helped the students see the bigger picture of their learning.
meanings.sent5: The practicums were like stepping stones that guided the students towards mastering their skills.

meanings.definition: A period of practical experience in a particular field, especially as part of a course of study
meanings.sent1: The culinary students had practicums at a local restaurant to learn cooking techniques.
meanings.sent2: During the practicums, the interns shadowed experienced professionals to learn the ropes.
meanings.sent3: The practicums turned out to be a fun adventure for the students, filled with new challenges.
meanings.sent4: The practicums were a bridge between theory and real-world application for the students.
meanings.sent5: The practicums were like treasure hunts, uncovering valuable skills and knowledge for the students.
